name: Diamond Match - 3 Free Fun Addictive Game
name_original: Diamond Match - 3 Free Fun Addictive Game
description:
Diamond match game is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colorful Diamond crunching effects and well designed puzzles! With Diamond style jewels to eliminate in each level, Diamond match is twice the fun but familiar to play

Diamond match game is a match 3 game with colourful and jewels, majestic combinations, and challenging game modes featuring magical potion!

Diamond match is the most popular Jewels pop/breaking/buster game! Another classic Diamond match-three game. #1 Puzzle game on the world.

Fun with Diamond game is a great way to improve your retention, memory skills like visual retention, mnemonic skills, concentration and cognitive skills!

- 298 levels with time and moves limit.
- Unlock levels in a panel where you can access at any time or continue your progress in the game.
- Game settings to turn off sound or background music

It is an exciting free time activity that will catch your eye with unbelievable beauty and unexpected new things appearing.
Destroy the target Diamond to level up.
Play for free as you match and detonate as many Diamond as you can.

How to play:
1. Just match three or more same identical Diamond to score points.
2. Eliminate the more Diamond quickly can get extra scores. Match the Diamond until the board transparency,the Crystal star will appear.
3. By swipe Diamond to score more and check your matching skills

Easy and fun to start but a challenge
New and improved game modes
Special boosters & powers to help you pass those tricky levels
Eye-catching graphics and colorful gameplay
Cool Sound

Enjoy with Diamond match
